mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERTABLE(mid, mpassword, mname, mphone, memail, mpostcode, maddress, mdetailAddress, mextraAddress, mprofilename) VALUES(#{mid}, #{mpassword}, #{mname}, #{mphone}, #{memail}, #{mpostcode}, #{maddress}, #{mdetailAddress}, #{mextraAddress}, #{mprofilename})
mapper.select: SELECT mid, mname, mphone, memail FROM MEMBERTABLE
